Text: Thanks for this, Bone.  Appreciate it!  The video looks better than anything else so far.  Audio seems to be in sync.  A little tinny, but good.  Nice up!
Oh yeah, forgot to mention that when I tried to play the sample it was audio only.  No video.  Could have just been me, but thought I'd mention it.

thx BONE
A/9 still a tad off on syc
V/10
Please download contagion and don't be afraid of the dark, we know you bone will do an awesome job, and we won't have to deal with these fake downloads.
Just a thought, if you use VLC player you can adjust the audio/picture sync either + or - to catch up or slow down till it match's. Hope this helps. BONE you rock bruv ROCK!!!
